name: Backgammon Go: Live Tournament
description:
Play Free Backgammon Go Pro now, The first and only online Backgammon App with fair-play guarantee!

Challenge your friends, show your skills and clash with all players around the world. Conquer all checkers, master the backgammon rules and defeat all professional players of Back gammon, one of the funniest and most entertaining and most popular strategy board games for adult along with other dice game for adult and online chess iconic such as okey and yahtzee games.

Free to play: enjoy one of the best strategy board chess game in the world, online and totally FREE!

Show your skill: go around the world, challenge different boards from Istanbul, Moscow to Texas with different game modes and win the king of nackgammon. Challenge all the professional backgamon players and win the crown. When you were King, you can collect income as coins every minute.

Collect tons of coins: bet, win, get rich and show the world who is the best. We offer the best experience to our users via the betting system, which allows you to clash with other users and win their coins.

Unlock new and exciting content: level up and collect tons of FREE coins, more than you can imagine with any poker or slots game. Lead the boards, throw the powerball!

Play online: Invite and challenge your friend and thousands of players around the world is now one snap away, no matter you are new players or professional, sharpen your skill, bet and enjoy fun online table games!

Enjoy the game anywhere: Play with any device and compete with users from all platforms. It's easier than ever now to play with your laptop, phone and tablet without worrying about losing your game progress. We do take good care of our Lords!

Elegant graphics: To all internet backgammon lords, all are deserved to experience the best graphics. From classic dices, spin table and hall to fancy seasoning boards!

Fair-Play: Unlike other Backgammon sets, Backgammon Go Pro app is developed with the latest technology and mechanic to guarantee all the dices rolling and matching are fair-play with totally 100% randomness and no cheat, no bug.

Roll the Dice & Join the community now! No matter you call it Nardi, Narde, Nard, Tavla or Acey Deucey, sohbet the fun experience and competition is always in this universal best strategy board game, one of the most challenging thinking chess games. And behind the game is the biggest community of online table game, share your strategy, your experience and connect with all players around the world!

Follow us on Backgammon Go's official channels!
Website: http://www.backgammongo.com/
